description: Housed in the resort of the same name, this elegant restaurant is full of historic charm, enhanced by its white damask linen and beautiful candlesticks. The wine list pays obvious tribute to the famous Franciacorta region and also includes an excellent choice of champagnes, while the modern cuisine shows touches of traditional influence alongside more creative twists. Seasonal ingredients are to the fore here.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
